Class AnswersTest

java.lang.Object
database.BaseDatabaseTest
database.tests.AnswersTest
@TestMethodOrder(org.junit.jupiter.api.MethodOrderer.OrderAnnotation.class) public class AnswersTest extends BaseDatabaseTest
Unit tests for the Answers repository.

This test class verifies various operations performed on the Answers repository, including creation, retrieval, updating, deletion, pinning, searching, and fetching by user.

It interacts with the Users and Questions repositories to ensure answers are created, related to specific questions, and queried correctly.

Author:
Dhruv
